title: Case When Statements
description:
Practice using case/when for multiple condition checking.

Steps:
1. Implement `day_type` so `day_type('Monday')` returns "weekday"; `day_type('Saturday')` returns "weekend".
2. Implement `letter_grade` so `letter_grade(95)` returns "A"; `letter_grade(85)` returns "B"; `letter_grade(45)` returns "F".

Expected results:
- `day_type('Monday')` returns "weekday"
- `day_type('Saturday')` returns "weekend"
- `letter_grade(95)` returns "A"
- `letter_grade(85)` returns "B"
- `letter_grade(45)` returns "F"
